title: Talking About Technology
description: Practice discussing technology use, digital habits, and online experiences.

sentences.text: I think I spend too much time on my phone every day.
sentences.translation: 저는 매일 휴대폰에 너무 많은 시간을 쓰는 것 같아요.

sentences.text: Social media can be useful, but it can also be distracting.
sentences.translation: 소셜 미디어는 유용할 수 있지만, 집중을 방해할 수도 있어요.

sentences.text: I usually check my emails first thing in the morning.
sentences.translation: 저는 보통 아침에 일어나자마자 이메일을 확인해요.
sentences.tips: 'first thing in the morning'은 '아침에 제일 먼저'라는 관용구예요.

sentences.text: I've been trying to reduce my screen time recently.
sentences.translation: 저는 최근에 화면 시청 시간을 줄이려고 노력하고 있어요.

sentences.text: In my opinion, technology has more advantages than disadvantages.
sentences.translation: 제 생각에는 기술은 단점보다 장점이 더 많아요.

sentences.text: I couldn't live without my smartphone anymore.
sentences.translation: 이제 스마트폰 없이는 살 수 없을 것 같아요.
sentences.tips: 'couldn't live without'은 필수적임을 표현하는 과장 표현이에요.

sentences.text: Online shopping has completely changed the way I buy things.
sentences.translation: 온라인 쇼핑이 제가 물건을 사는 방식을 완전히 바꿨어요.

sentences.text: I prefer watching videos online rather than on TV.
sentences.translation: 저는 TV보다 온라인으로 영상을 보는 것을 선호해요.
sentences.tips: 'prefer A rather than B'로 선호도를 표현하세요.

sentences.text: My password was changed because someone tried to hack my account.
sentences.translation: 누군가 제 계정을 해킹하려고 해서 비밀번호가 변경되었어요.

sentences.text: I think privacy is becoming a bigger concern these days.
sentences.translation: 요즘 프라이버시가 더 큰 문제가 되고 있는 것 같아요.

sentences.text: Have you ever deleted an app because it was too addictive?
sentences.translation: 너무 중독성이 강해서 앱을 삭제한 적 있어요?
sentences.tips: 'Have you ever'로 경험을 물어보세요. 의문문 억양으로 끝내세요.

sentences.text: The latest update has fixed most of the problems.

lines.text: How much time do you spend on social media every day?
Probably about two hours. Maybe more on weekends. What about you?
I've been trying to cut down. I think I was spending over three hours a day.
That's a lot. What made you decide to reduce it?
I noticed it was affecting my sleep. I was scrolling in bed until midnight.
I have the same problem. I've heard that the blue light isn't good for you.
Exactly. So now I put my phone in another room before bed.
That's a good idea. Has it helped?
Definitely. I'm sleeping much better now.
Maybe I should try that too. It sounds like it's worth it.

items: Did you pronounce technology words clearly (algorithm, notification, etc.)?
Did you use appropriate stress in compound words (smartphone, password)?
Did you use rising intonation for questions?
Did you speak at a natural pace?
Did you use passive voice correctly?
Did you complete sentences without long pauses?
Did you practice the dialogue with natural rhythm?
Did you use passive voice correctly?
Did you use present perfect for recent changes?
Did you use comparatives correctly (more than, better)?
Did you use appropriate vocabulary for technology?
Did you make logical arguments for/against technology?
Did you engage naturally in the dialogue?
